title: "New artificial intelligence model shows hidden turbulence in Sun's atmosphere"
excerpt: "A new model of artificial intelligence has shown hidden turbulence in the atmosphere of the Sun. The research, published in Astronomy & Astrophysics, shows multi-scale deep learning for estimating horizontal velocity fields on the solar surface."
